mapper.select: SELECT tag.id, tag.name,tag.img,tag.sort,tag.describ,(select count(atag.id) as acount from red_ask_tags atag where atag.tid=tag.id) as askcount FROM red_category_tag tag ORDER BY tag.gmt_create DESC
SELECT tag.id, tag.name,tag.bdescrib,tag.keywords FROM red_category_tag tag LEFT OUTER JOIN red_blog_type btype ON btype.id=tag.parenttype where btype.type = #{bType} ORDER BY tag.sort DESC

SELECT tag.id, tag.name,tag.img,tag.sort,tag.describ FROM red_category_tag tag LEFT OUTER JOIN red_ask_tags tags ON tags.tid=tag.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_user_ask ask ON ask.id=tags.qid WHERE tag.id = {#tid}
